27#ifndef HB_AAT_LAYOUT_HH
28#define HB_AAT_LAYOUT_HH
29
30#include "hb.hh"
31
32#include "hb-ot-shape.hh"
33#include "hb-aat-ltag-table.hh"
34
35struct hb_aat_feature_mapping_t
36{
37 hb_tag_t otFeatureTag;
38 hb_aat_layout_feature_type_t aatFeatureType;
39 hb_aat_layout_feature_selector_t selectorToEnable;
40 hb_aat_layout_feature_selector_t selectorToDisable;
41
42 int cmp (hb_tag_t key) const
43 { return key < otFeatureTag ? -1 : key > otFeatureTag ? 1 : 0; }
44};
45
46HB_INTERNAL const hb_aat_feature_mapping_t *
47hb_aat_layout_find_feature_mapping (hb_tag_t tag);
48
49HB_INTERNAL void
50hb_aat_layout_compile_map (const hb_aat_map_builder_t *mapper,
51 hb_aat_map_t *map);
52
53HB_INTERNAL void
54hb_aat_layout_substitute (const hb_ot_shape_plan_t *plan,
55 hb_font_t *font,
56 hb_buffer_t *buffer,
57 const hb_feature_t *features,
58 unsigned num_features);
59
60HB_INTERNAL void
61hb_aat_layout_zero_width_deleted_glyphs (hb_buffer_t *buffer);
62
63HB_INTERNAL void
64hb_aat_layout_remove_deleted_glyphs (hb_buffer_t *buffer);
65
66HB_INTERNAL void
67hb_aat_layout_position (const hb_ot_shape_plan_t *plan,
68 hb_font_t *font,
69 hb_buffer_t *buffer);
70
71HB_INTERNAL void
72hb_aat_layout_track (const hb_ot_shape_plan_t *plan,
73 hb_font_t *font,
74 hb_buffer_t *buffer);
75
76
77#endif /* HB_AAT_LAYOUT_HH */
78
